Did the pastie break my repo display ?

16 Jan 2009 – Denver, CO

For some weird reason the repo display wasn’t showing in the last post. The only thing different about it was the pastie, e.g.

<script src='http://pastie.org/349089.js'></script>

If I make this the last line of text before its piped thru jekyll, the repo-display Javascript fails. Wierdness.
